comments.body:
add within `build` section:
```yaml
entry_points:
  - acs_destripe = acstools.acs_destripe:main
  - acs_destripe_plus = acstools.acs_destripe_plus:main
```

This will allow things to work on Windows.

diffHunk:

    - acs_destripe_plus = acstools.acs_destripe_plus:main

requirements:
  host:
